description.narrative: Social Protection System developed through initiatives for the reinforcement of the socio economic capacity of the families and the communities, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2010-2018 - Outcome 3 / Child Protection: Girls and boys live in a protective environment in accordance to international standards on child rights and protection by the end of 2018.

description.narrative: A total of 3,346 solidarity groups (Nawe Nuze) reinforced by UNICEF Burundi supported 60,049 girls and 57,299 boys in their communities while and Project Lumiere reached 15,922 households with durable and safe solar lighting systems. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
